title: Riot pls help /remake is destroying my life
body:
The new /remake option is killing me.
I'm not really sure how to start this as this is my first discussion post.

But pretty much ive been having a bad day. My internet dropped on me twice and by the time I can ever reconnect (i know how to catch up and play safe I'm never really gone for long if anything were to happen) I get leaver (remake) status. So I got the 5 game priority queue, and demoted to gold 4 and I managed to get myself together and get to 95 lp getting ready to get back into my series or whatever and the game literally says cannot connect to server mid loading screen. I hit retry and it goes back into loading but I can't hit any buttons. The game is stuck on my screen. Can't even ctrl- alt- dlt. I'm just stuck there watching everyone leave base. And renek too starts spanning chat: "REMAKE, MAKE THIS GUY LOSE"
While my duo is trying to explain that I'm having tech problems.

And with no other option all i could do is just shut my cpu off and just kinda give up on life.
By the time I reset my computer I'll get the  status and be banned for a day or however you guys go about the punishment system.

Is there anything you can do to help

Update: I just tried to play a game to get the low priority queue out of the way. Put fill and got support and all. Game doesn't want to go into loading. By  time I get it to work /remake out of loading.

replies.body: This definitely sounds like a crappy situation, and I'd like to help get this resolved so you can climb back up that ladder.  Some troubleshooting is certainly required here, otherwise, you'll keep getting errors and continue to escalate your [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) level.  Your specific issue sounds like your network is having problems connecting to the game server, which may result in that error or a black screen.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and follow each step to troubleshoot.  That should get you fixed up!
I honestly haven't played in like 2 days. Every time my 20 min low priority queue is up the client just start acting funny or crashes. So I can't catch a game.
